name: To Thine Own Heart Feed Blood
name_original: To Thine Own Heart Feed Blood
description:
A short game about keeping the massive heart in your basement fed with blood. Kill the bloodbeasts and bring their blood back to the heart before time runs out.

Music by  @AloneWeStand (on twitter), art by @infindlay (also twitter).

WASD to move and Spacebar to swing your dagger.

Tip: the creatures you need to kill for blood spawn randomly and more spawn when one is killed. They can show  up in places you've already  looked or in places where you've killed them before.
